title: IsaacGPT
description:
Trained a Large Language Model (LLM) using PyTorch training loop and Unsupervised Learning.
 Deployed the LLM using Docker and FastAPI.
 Created a frontend React chat interface using React and integrated the LLM with it

title: Map My Path
description: Developed an AI-powered route optimization system for filtered search for a place and routing on a map, leveraging machine learning, React, Leaflet, and REST APIs

title: mytravelblog
description: Created a full-stack web app using React, Next.js, PostgreSQL, and Azure Blob Storage for travel content sharing.
